keyEvents.title: Celestial Dragon Mjosgard Crashes on Fish-Man Island
keyEvents.description: World Noble Donquixote Mjosgard's ship crashes on Fish-Man Island, creating a major crisis as former slaves confront their oppressor.
keyEvents.significance: This event tests the island's commitment to peace and brings the conflict between Fish-Men and their former enslavers to a head.

keyEvents.title: Queen Otohime Saves Mjosgard
keyEvents.description: Queen Otohime shields Mjosgard from assassination, demonstrating her commitment to breaking the cycle of hatred even at great personal cost.
keyEvents.significance: This moment on Fish-Man Island represents the pinnacle of Otohime's peace philosophy and will have lasting effects on the island's future.

keyEvents.title: Shirahoshi's Power Revealed Near Fish-Man Island
keyEvents.description: Five massive Sea Kings appear near Fish-Man Island when Shirahoshi screams, revealing her power as the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.
keyEvents.significance: This revelation near Fish-Man Island shows that the island is home to one of the Ancient Weapons, fundamentally changing its importance in the world.
